t: Hakam Din Musical Instruments
s: We are a family upholding the legacy of excellence, craftsmanship passed down by our great grandfather, Mr. Hakam Din-1890. The art of handcrafting instruments courses through our family's veins, passed from heart to heart, and generation to generation.

s: Hakam Din, Since 1910, a trusted name in the world of musical instruments. As a family-owned and operated business, we have proudly carried forward a legacy of excellence and craftsmanship for over a century. Our commitment to quality and passion for music is why we've withstood the test of time.

t: Hakam Din Musical Instruments | eBay Stores
s: We are a family upholding the legacy of craftsmanship passed down by our great grandfather, Mr. Hakam Din. He was a skilled wood-tuner and crafted his first bagpipe in the 1890s, a masterpiece now enshrined in the National Museum of Scotland, Museum of Piping.
